This value will be the total amount deposited into your online account. Please adjust amount accordingly.
Account credit denotes the total amount that will ultimately end up in your online account balance once this transaction is completed.

Cost denotes the total amount it will cost to forward funds from the selected payment source to the target account. This amount is usually higher than the actual account credit amount due to external fees incured during our acceptance of your funds.
The withdraw amount is the amount you have requested to debit from your online account balance.

The account debit is the total cost that will be debited from your online account balance. For example, if you request to withdraw $100 and the processing fee was $5 your account debit total would be $105. In other words, you must have $105 in your online account balance to withdraw $100.

If this item will be sold in auction-bidding format, enter a starting price otherwise leave this field as 0.00.
If this item can be purchased outright through the use of Buy Now from the listing enter a buy now price otherwise leave this field as 0.00.
If you want to set a reserve price for your item enter the reserve price you wish to set otherwise leave this field as 0.00.

Enter the amount of quantity you are selling for this item. For example, if you have 10 of the same items you are selling then you would enter 10 otherwise enter 1 into this field if you are selling a single item.
Enter how many items is in lot or enter 1 if price is for single item.

If this item will be scheduled to start on a specific future date enter realtime|YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS as the value (realtime separated by a pipe delimiter following a future start date) otherwise if this item is a regular fixed price listing or auction style event which will start immediately enter public into this field.

If you want to sell this item by letting people bid and / or choose to buy this item via buy now (if you entered a buy now price in column 4) then it is recommended that you enter regular into this field otherwise if you wish to sell this item via buy now only (no bidding) enter fixed into this field. Additionally, if you are only listing this item as a classifieds item (no direct purchase) please enter classified into this field.
In order to assign this item to a specific category in the marketplace you must already know the category id number of the category you wish to assign this item to.

You can assign single or multiple pictures to your item by entering a valid url where the picture exists. For example: http://domain.com/image.gif otherwise leave this field blank if no picture will be assigned.

During this membership upgrade process you will leave our web site momentarily to be redirected over to Paypal to get your your membership activated by confirming your membership details at Paypal. Once payment over at Paypal is verified your membership status on our web site will become activated.

Paypal will continue to bill you for the duration you selected on the previous menu and will continue to bill your account until you choose to cancel your membership. For example, if you subscribe for 12 months then you will not be billed again until 12 months from now.
This will be an automated process whereby Paypal will notify us upon successful membership payments from you.

Please note: If you manually cancel your membership plan on paypal.com before your renew date your membership will become automatically deactivated. This is to prevent fraud and unauthorized usage of our web site for cancelled membership payments. This same rule applies for chargebacks and refunds.

A recurring membership is handled by a 3rd party payment gateway like PayPal or Moneybookers and is only available when you choose the Upgrade Membership option from the bottom portion of the Membership Menu.

When enabled, the membership auto-payment feature will automatically pay any unpaid membership fees from your account balance (based on funds deposited to your Account Balance). In other words, you must deposit funds to your account balance for this feature to work.

Auto payments should not be confused with Recurring Memberships. A recurring membership is handled by 3rd party payment gateways like PayPal and Moneybookers and is only available when you choose the Upgrade Membership option from the bottom portion of the Membership Menu. When a Recurring Subscription is configured for your account the Auto-Payment membership feature offers no use.

Input type refers to the type of permission you are creating. If you decide that the permission you need to work with will be a switch, like a permission you can enable or disable using the Yes or No radio boxes, choose Yes / No as your input type. Remember if you choose Yes / No your value will need to be either yes or no as the default value.

If you require your input type to be that of a number which can be verified using a similar approach to the above example, choose the input type of Integer.

A variable name is a unique name to create this new permission option from. You should never create a new permission with the same variable name or unexpected results may occur.

Variable names should never contain a space, if you need to space your variable use underscores as spaces like some_permission for example. Variable names should be in clear text and should not contain any special characters. Additionally, for consistency, do not use numbers for the variable name.

If you selected the Type of this new permission as Yes / No then the default values are yes for Yes and no for No.

Membership plan migration allows you to move customers from one membership plan to another

Membership plan migration allows the administrator to move all customers from one plan to another plan within the membership system. Each user's 'renew' date for the old membership's cycle will remain unchanged until expired.

If the new plan you will be migrating to is a paid membership plan, each user will be invoiced for the new membership plan It is recommended that the old and new membership plan have the same duration/units to avoid customer disputes in regards to the duration and billing period of their previous membership plan.

Membership plan migration is a transparent process that will not inform customers regarding any administrative migration action. It is recommended that membership plan migration should be thought-out and planned ahead of time before the actual migration-process:
Send bulk email to customers of the existing membership plan informing ahead of time
Find out the exact details of the old plans duration and units. Be sure the new plan is the same

This column represents which budget group is currently assigned to a particular category

This column represents how many pre-defined questions exist within a particular category. Questions are presented during the posting of an auction and answers are specified by the purchaser. For example, Web Design might have a question called Needs Logo? and buyers answer either Yes or No.

This column represents how many pre-defined category questions exist. Questions are presented during the posting of an auction and answers are specified by auction owner. For example, Computers might have a question called Condition and the seller answers with (New, Used or Damaged). Once this occurs, the left nav category results can also give users a question finder (if you enable) to narrow down their search results.

This column represents the currently assigned Bid Increment Group for a particular category. For example, if you have already setup bid range increments of 5.00 (assigned to the selected increment group) and the current bid up for auction is 20.00, the next minimum bid amount (+ increment) would be 25.00

This column represents how many pre-defined bid fields exist. Bid Fields are presented during the bid proposal posting process and answers completed by bidders. For example, PHP might have a bid field called Years Experience in PHP? and bidders answer 2, 3, 4 years, etc.

For example, if you are creating a membership task you would call this memberships or something like my_memberships. Replace all spaces with underscores like_this. Do not use any special characters.

You may specify what minutes past the hour this task will run. For example, you can run this task 15, 30, 45 and 55 minutes past the hour or enter * for every minute (not recommended for larger tasks)
You may specify what hour this task will run. For example, you can run this task 0 (12:00 AM) or 23 (11:00 PM). Additionally, you may enter * for every hour

You may specify what day of the week this task will run. For example, you can run this task on Sunday by selecting Sunday. Additionally, you may enter * for every day (or by allowing the Day of the Week setting below to become activated)

You may specify what day of the month this task will run. For example, you can run this task on the 1st of each month by selecting 1. Additionally, you may enter * for every month (or by allowing the Day of the Month setting above to become activated)
Whenever a task you create is executed at the specified time, the cron system may log this event for later review. If you do not require saving the logs of executed tasks then set this option to no.

You will enter the name of the PHP script you wish to execute in the field provided. This script must already be uploaded to the ./functions/cron/ folder. The filename must be named appropriately such as cron.scriptname.php

FVF stands for Final Value Fee and is a fee that is applied when one or more of your items have been sold via auction format or buy now feature.

This is the fee that is charged to sellers for the use of secure escrow payments from buyers (if applicable). Additionally, this transaction fee will be generated so you can view and make payment once you mark an item within Escrow as shipped and after the buyer releases funds within escrow to your online account balance.

Confirm delivery means that it is up to you as the seller to confirm the delivery status of the purchased items. This will let the buyer know that his/her shipment has begun additionally it will release any digital download media downloadable to the buyer.

Buy Now
Skip the bidding process by purchasing this item via Buy Now directly from this seller.

If this seller only has 1 item left this auction will close early if a bidder decides to purchase this item via buy now.

The starting price is the amount you set the starting bid amount in your auction event. Bidders will need to begin the bid amounts based on a value equal or above your starting price. Note: depending on the category, you may be able to set a reserve price which will ensure a price you desire is met before the item sells.

By default, your listing itself will be a single LOT. If you would like to sell 100 shirts instead of just 1 please be sure to choose the LOT option from the pull down menu and enter how many items exist in your single LOT.

If you would like to sell multiple items to several buyers during this event you will need to set your auction format to fixed price only by clicking the Fixed Price tab and entering your price information.

A reserve price is a hidden amount you can set which no bidder can see that ensures you receive a desired amount before the item sells. If this option is not used the item will sell for an amount higher or equal to the starting price.

If you are selling shirts for $20 each and you have 2 for sale then enter 20.00 and leave the pull down menu on Items. You would then enter 2 in the qty field. Additionally, if you've chosen LOTS from the pull down menu please ensure that you adjust your buy now price to the sale of X items within each LOT. Example: $20/item X 50 = $1000 buy now price (per LOT).
IF stands for insertion fee and is a fee that is applied when you list one or more of your items within a category that have insertion fees enabled.
FVF stands for Final Value Fee that is charged to bidders for hired bids. These are calculated and determined on a per-category basis and is only generated after the bid is accepted.

This number will represent how many bids you have left for today. Please remember, your bid count will reset each day.

Additionally, when placing a bid through proxy (highest amount you are willing to pay) will also cause your bid count to deplete for each bid the proxy agent must bid on your behalf to raise your current bid.

When you place a bid for an item, enter the maximum amount you are willing to pay for that item. This amount will always be kept in secret. Whenever someone else places a bid, our service will automatically enter the lowest possible bid for you, up to your maximum proxy bid amount, until you are the winning bidder.

Your available balance is the amount of funds available to you. Additionally, this amount can be withdrawn from the withdraw menu. For example, if you have $500 in your account and decide to withdraw $200, your available balance would be $300.

Your total balance is the amount of funds available to you before any scheduled transactions have occured. For example, if you have $500 in your account and decide to withdraw $200, your total balance would be $500 (until processed). Once one or more scheduled transactions have been processed your total balance would equal the sum of your available balance.
Income spent refers to the total amount of funds your account has spent since inception. This includes fees and other related transactions with an amount owing greater than zero.

Income received refers to the total amount of funds your account has received or earned since inception. This includes account-credits, escrow payment releases to your account and other related transactions with an amount received greater than zero.

If you would like to shut down the entire marketplace temporarily (to resolve a problem or to upgrade to a newer version) you should enable this option. When enabled a custom message will be displayed to the user viewing the marketplace.
Exclude IP addresses from maintenance mode

This setting is useful if you have enabled maintenance mode and wish to allow access to specific IP addresses only. Please separate IP addresses using 1 comma and 1 space: 1.1.1.1, 1.1.1.*, 2.2.*, or may also format your ip addresses using newlines.
Exclude specific php scripts from maintenance mode
Please separate PHP scripts using 1 comma and 1 space: script1.php, script2.php, or may also format your script filenames using newlines.
Maintenance mode phrase displayed to visitors
This phrase is editable from your language phrase manager. When maintenance mode is on visitors will see this phrase converted into it's intended message.
Would you like to enable the auto-relist service listing feature?
When enabled this setting will let a buyer choose to have their service listing auto-relist if no bids are placed until the countdown expires.
Can users pay to auto-relist their service listing?
When enabled this setting will let a buyer have the ability to pay to auto-relist their service listing through the use of auto-relist feature.
How much does it cost to use the auto-relist feature?
This setting works only when you have enabled the ability for users to pay to auto-relist their service listing. For example, enter 5.00 if you would like to charge five dollars.
How many days will the service project be relisted for?

This setting works only when you have enabled auto-relist. For example, enter 7 if you would like to auto-relist listings for 7 days. After this 7 day period (for example) users will have to post a new project listing.
Would you like to enable the bold product listing title option?
When enabled this setting will let a user see the bold listing title option to enhance their listing when creating a new auction listing.
Can users pay to bold the title of their product listing?
When enabled this setting will let a user have the ability to pay to enhance their listing through the use of bold listing feature.
How much does it cost to use the bold product listing feature?
This setting works only when you have enabled the ability for users to pay to bold their listing. For example, enter 5.00 if you would like to charge five dollars.
Can users feature their product auction listing on the front home page?
If you would like to give users the ability to feature their auction listing on the home page when creating a new listing please enable this setting.
Would you like to charge a fee to feature product auction listings on the home page?
If you would like to give users the ability to pay you for featuring their listing when creating a new auction please enable this setting.
Home page Featured product listing fee amount
This setting works only when you are charging members for featuring their listing on the home page of the marketplace. The amount you enter in this field can only be a fixed dollar amount.
Would you like to enable the auto-relist product listing feature?
When enabled this setting will let a seller choose to have their listing auto-relist if no bids are placed until the countdown expires.
Can users pay to auto-relist their product listing?
When enabled this setting will let a seller have the ability to pay to auto-relist their listing through the use of auto-relist feature.
How much does it cost to use the auto-relist feature?
This setting works only when you have enabled the ability for users to pay to auto-relist their listing. For example, enter 5.00 if you would like to charge five dollars.
How many days will the item be relisted for?

This setting works only when you have enabled auto-relist. For example, enter 7 if you would like to auto-relist listings for 7 days. After this 7 day period (for example) users will have to post a new listing.
Would you like to enable communication via PMB after the product award process is finished?
This setting allows you to enable or disable private message board communication after a product buyer wins an item through the marketplace.
Would you like to enable sharing of digital media via mediashare after a product award process is finished?
This setting allows you to enable or disable mediashare communication after a product buyer wins an item through the marketplace.
Can users pay to feature their portfolio items?
If you would like to give users the ability to pay you for featuring their portfolio items from their portfolio menu please enable this setting.
How much does it cost to feature portfolio items?
This setting can only be used if users can pay to feature their portfolio items. Enter the amount it will cost a user to feature their portfolio item.
Transaction description that will appear on the new users transaction history
This feature allows you to stamp the transaction description to your own phrase.
Number of thumbnails to display on each page within portfolios?
This setting allows you to define how many portfolio images or items will be displayed on the page at once. The default setting is 9.

This setting allows you to specify which image format extensions are allowed to be displayed as a graphical image within the portfolio section. This setting requires that the portfolio system to be enabled. Please separate each extension using 1 comma and 1 space. Example: .gif, .jpg, .png.
Would you like to enable registration security image?

When enabled a graphical security code embedded into an image will be displayed. The user registering would need to type in the characters found within the security image to continue registration. This feature prevents search engines and other robots from registering and ensures that a real human is present.
Would you like to enable new user registration bonus?
If you would like to give newly registered users a signup bonus for marketing purposes please enable this setting.
Phone display format on registration form?

This setting is especially useful for marketplaces that are not hosted in US or Canada. This feature accepts one of two answers: US or OTHER. When US is used, a phone number form will be presented like [x]-[xxx]-[xxx]-[xxxx], whereas using OTHER will present 1 form input box for foreign phone number formats.
Would you like to allow special characters in usernames during user and API registration?
This feature allow members to use special characters within their username like periods, brackets, utf-8 characters during registration to the site via API and web registration modes.
Would you like to enable the Quick Registration feature for new users?

The quick registration setting allows users to quickly register to the marketplace though the use of AJAX. Note: quick registration should only be used if you experience a low registration rate on a day to day basis. When quick registration is enabled users will not be building their full profile and must update their personal information after they have registered. Quick registration can be found on the log-in menu.
Signup registration bonus amount to give new members
When this setting is enabled the amount entered will be credited to the new users online account balance.
Bonus item name that will appear on the new users transaction history
When new registration account bonus is enabled this feature allows you to stamp the new registration signup bonus transaction description to your own phrase.
Would you like to ask members their gender?

For marketing purposes you may wish to ask members what their gender is during registration. If you enable this, users will have the option of selecting their gender. Additionally, if this option is enabled users can update their gender preference from their personal profile menu (not public profile).
If you would like to enable the Referral System you should set this option to yes. When enabled the user will see their referral activity from their main dashboard menu when they first sign-in.
Payout amount to customers whom refer *valid* members?

This value will not automatically credit a users account balance by itself. This amount will determine the value to show when viewing your referral activity allowing you to quickly click Credit Account for any referrals you would like to pay out.
Would you like to save attachments directly to the database?

This setting should be one of the first settings you should be deciding upon prior to launching in a production environment. If you would like to store attachments within the database please enable this setting. By default, attachments are saved in the database.

Pros: Backups made easy (no need to backup physical files)
Cons: May increase database server resulting in slower access rates over time.
Would you like to enable image watermarking?
This setting let you determine if the upload system will stamp an image or text-only based watermark on uploaded images.
Text string to use as the watermark?
If you are using text message strings as your watermark enter the text here otherwise leave blank for image mode watermarking.

If you are using image based watermarking please enter the image filename only (no path) for the watermark image. Watermark images can be found or uploaded in ./images/default/watermarks/[filename.*] Format: .gif or .png
Font size to use for text based watermarks?

When using text strings for watermarks please enter the font size for the text displayed as the watermark. Default is 10. Please take note that if your main item photo (when viewing the listing page) is set higher than 310 x 310 from your attachment settings you may need to increase the font size of this setting.
Image opacity for the watermark when image watermarking is used?
This setting allows you to determine the watermark's image opacity when it's stamped on the image file. Default 80.
Font file used to generate text based watermarks?
Enter a font name only (not a full path) to the actual TTF font used to generate text based watermarks. Default in901xki.ttf. Fonts are located in ./functions/fonts/
Enter the quality output of the watermark overlay once applied to a picture
To reduce the file size (quality) of the picture being processed with a watermark enter a quality setting from 10 to 100. Default 100 (best quality).
Enter the watermark angle output placement once applied to a picture
The angle in degrees with 0 degrees being left-to-right reading text. Higher values represent a counter-clockwise rotation. For example, a value of 90 would result in bottom-to-top overlay watermark.
Enter the watermark position identifier once applied to a picture

To position and place your watermark overlay on the picture being processed please use either: TOPLEFT, TOPCENTER, TOPRIGHT, MIDLEFT, MIDCENTER, MIDRIGHT, BOTLEFT, BOTCENTER or BOTRIGHT. Default is TOPLEFT.
Enter the padding to use of the watermark overlay once applied to a picture
To prevent your watermark image or text mark from being flush top or left and to promote padding please enter a number (in pixels) to pad the overlay. Default is 5.
Would you like to watermark uploaded profile pictures?
This setting allows you to watermark any profile images uploaded by members to the marketplace.
Would you like to watermark uploaded portfolio pictures?
This setting allows you to watermark any porfolio images uploaded by members to the marketplace.
Would you like to watermark uploaded item pictures?
This setting allows you to watermark any item pictures uploaded by members to the marketplace.
Would you like to watermark uploaded store item pictures?
This setting allows you to watermark any store item pictures uploaded by members to the marketplace.
Can members upload attachments without being moderated by staff?

Depending on your market niche, you may need to enable attachment moderation. If you feel no need to verify uploaded images, files and other media before they are publically visible in the marketplace please enable this setting. When this setting is disabled (verifying all attachments), it should be noted that you need to visit the moderate tab from the attachment manager to validate all pending uploads or users will never see them.
Can members upload attachments within mediashare without being moderated by staff?

Workspace is usually a much more secure interface for users who are awarded projects the ability to transfer files and media back and forth to their buyers. If you feel no need to verify uploaded mediashare files and other media before they are publically visible in the marketplace please disable this setting.
Maximum portfolio thumbnail attachment [WIDTH in px]
Maximum portfolio thumbnail attachment [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum search result list view thumbnail [WIDTH in px]
Maximum search result list view thumbnail [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum search result gallery view thumbnail [WIDTH in px]
Maximum search result gallery view thumbnail [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum search result snapshot view thumbnail [WIDTH in px]
Maximum search result snapshot view thumbnail [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum default thumbnail attachment [WIDTH in px]
Maximum default thumbnail attachment [HEIGHT in px]
Default country name to display on registration form?
When users are viewing the registration form for the first time, which Country would you like displayed by default?
Default state name to display on registration form?
When users are viewing the registration form for the first time, which major State/province would you like displayed by default?
Can a user that has funded an escrow account cancel and return funds back to their account balance?

Depending on the market niche you are serving, you can let the person paying into an escrow account request a funding cancellation request which would move funds previously paid into an escrow account back to the payers online account balance. By default this setting is disabled as it can lead to many disputes if abused by the end user.
Can a user who releases funds cancel and return those funds back to their account balance?

Depending on your niche, you can let the person paying into an escrow and who has already released funds from that escrow into the receivers account balance force a funding cancellation request which would move funds previously paid and released back to the payers online account balance. By default this setting is disabled as it can lead to many disputes if abused by the end user. Fees (if applied) will also be reversed.
Would you like to enable provider to buyer invoice generation fees?

When this setting is enabled, you can charge service providers a commission fee based on the invoice amount they are requesting from their trading partner (buyer). If you do not wish to generate fees for provider generated invoices to buyers through the marketplace please disable this option.
This setting applies to newly created transaction ids. If you enter a value of 10 then a unique transaction id will be created with this amount of characters.
When listing moderation is disabled the listing is posted for the public to see whereas when enabled an email is dispatched for admin to verify before public visibility.
Enable email to administrator on customer failed log-in attempts [includes attempted username and password]?
You can choose to inform the administrator of an attempted login failure report which will be sent via email.
Number of failed log-in attempts before the attempted [username] receives a failed email login report
For added security and protection, you can define how many login attempts can occur before the actual user connected to the account (username) will receive a failed login email report.
Enter the application extension mime [.php, .asp, etc] used to hide default .php extension

This option can mask script extentions like main.php -> main.jsp. For example: AddType application/x-httpd-php jsp would rewrite (mask) the php handler to .jsp. If an extension other than .php is used, all scripts must be renamed from .php to .jsp.
Enable email address filtering within private messages?

This option will attempt to search and replace email addresses when users are posting or viewing private messages. If you would like to hide email addresses within private messages you should enable this setting.
Enable domain name filtering within private messages?

This option will attempt to search and replace domain name type urls when users are posting or viewing private messages. If you would like to hide domain names within private messages you should enable this setting.
Enable Private Message BCC dispatch to the administrator?
Would you like to display the listing page slideshow images in a mini gallery?
How many rows to show in gallery view?

You can enable this option which would dispatch a blind carbon copy of the entire private message to the administrator. It would be recommended that you inform your community that PMB spy moderation is enabled if you decide to enable this setting. Some users may feel their privacy would be of concern if enabled.
Enable email address filtering within listed auction descriptions?

This option will attempt to search and replace email addresses when users are posting or viewing listed auction descriptions. If you would like to hide email addresses within the description of the listing you should enable this setting.
Enable domain name filtering within listed auction descriptions?

This option will attempt to search and replace domain name type urls when users are posting or viewing listed auction descriptions. If you would like to hide domain names within the description of the listing you should enable this setting.
Can members cancel a valid listing they have created (including drafts)?
If you would like to give members the ability to delist their auction from the marketplace (before any bids are placed) you should enable this setting.
Enable email address filtering within bid proposals?

This option will attempt to search and replace email addresses when users are posting or viewing bid proposals. If you would like to hide email addresses within bid proposals you should enable this setting.
Enable domain name filtering within bid proposals?

This option will attempt to search and replace domain name type urls when users are posting or viewing bid proposals. If you would like to hide domain names within bid proposals you should enable this setting.
Enable email address filtering within Public Selling Profile?

This option will attempt to search and replace email addresses when users are creating or viewing Public Selling Profile. If you would like to hide email addresses within Public Selling Profile you should enable this setting.
Enable domain name filtering within Public Selling Profile?

This option will attempt to search and replace domain name type urls when users are creating or viewing Public Selling Profile. If you would like to hide domain names within Public Selling Profile you should enable this setting.

When enabled, this feature will detect any user-submitted input within special areas such as posting a new listing, updating a listing, placing a bid to determine if the text contains words you have flagged as vulgar and replaced with predefined values you define.
The format is expected to be separated by 1 comma and 1 space. For example: word1, word2, etc.
This option will let you change any vulgar word that has been flagged and replace it with the string you predefine.

You can blacklist a number of IP Addresses using the blacklist. The format is expected to be separated by 1 comma and 1 space. For example: 1.1.1.1, 1.1.1.*, 2.2.*, or may also format your ip addresses using newlines.

Category listing counters is a great way to show your members how many listings have been posted within a particular category. In general, a new site should disable category counters until the site becomes active with various users posting active listings within the categories. As a result a category of Web Design would appear like: Web Design (12).
Maximum number of results to fetch and display for queries throughout the frontend marketplace?
This option communicates with your database and will let you define how many results to pull based on specific areas within the frontend of the marketplace.
Character responsible for the separation of fields within CSV operations?
Please use this setting to change the default CSV seperator value. By default the seperator character for CSV fields is a single comma with no spaces.
Character responsible for the encapsulation of fields within CSV operations?
Please use this setting to change the default CSV encapsulation value. For example: 'xxx','yyy'. By default the encapsulation character for CSV fields is a single quote with no spaces.
Enter the day parts listings are allowed to be posted for
If you would like to only allow 7 and 14 day listings you would enter 7,14. Separate days by a comma delimeter without spaces. To charge fees per day unit use format 7:1.00,14:2.00.
Enter the hour parts listings are allowed to be posted for
If you would like to only allow 12 and 24 hour listings you would enter 12,24. Separate hours by a comma delimeter without spaces. To charge fees per hour unit use format 12:1.00,24:2.00.
Enter the minute parts listings are allowed to be posted for
If you would like to only allow 30 and 90 minute listings you would enter 30,90. Separate minutes by a comma delimeter without spaces. To charge fees per minute unit use format 30:1.00,90:2.00.

If you have one or more valid distance calculation database tables (distance_canada, distance_usa, distance_uk or distance_nl) then you can enable this option to be used within the search results area. Note: users must also update their distance preference from their profile menu if not already enabled.
This setting controls the time zone in which the marketplace is located. All listings posted will adhere to this specific time zone.

This setting controls the global currency locale your marketplace will be operating under. This value will be used to format the average bid amounts, buy now price and other areas that display money within in the marketplace.

This setting allows you to set the live xml currency feed that will be read and parsed daily. The default feed is http://www.ecb.int/stats/eurofxref/eurofxref-daily.xml which is owned/operated by the European Central Bank (ECB).
Enable the currency selector when listing auctions?

When enabled, this setting will allow users posting listings to define the currency the listing accepts. Additionally, if bulk upload is enabled, the API chart will allow a special field to include a currency field (example: EUR, CAD, USD, etc)

This company name should not be confused with your Site title or Site Name. For example, ILance Inc. is a company name, ILance Marketplace could be the Site title / name. Company name will only show on invoices and transactions generated from the company to the users.

This setting will be presented on all page titles used for SEO. The site name/title should not be confused with your Company name. This name will be used within email templates and other areas like meta tags.
Your company address should be supplied in this area. This address will be presented on invoices and related transactions such as (print mode).
This setting will control what email address will be used when the marketplace is requested to dispatch email to a user. They will see this email address within the From: area of the email.
This setting is useful and should be provided to users who may request sales or customer support. At this time, the only place this phone number is displayed is on the print invoice template.

This option is especially helpful if you would like to force a default language to be displayed when users connect to the marketplace. In order for this setting to work, you must already know the language id number you wish to use before you change this setting. Failure to enter a proper language id number will result with unexpected results.

When product auction logic is enabled sellers can post new items for sale based on auction format and/or fixed price listing. The winner is determined by the highest bid or a purchase from the listing via buy now.
When service auction logic is enabled users can post new service auctions where the person posting the listing can award a single bidder for his/her project.
Private Message popup width window display size (pixels)

Private messages are generally served within a popup window that is activated by Javascript on a users web browser. This setting lets you define the width of the popup window when the user has clicked on a private message.
Private Message popup height window display size (pixels)
This setting lets you define the height of the popup window when the user has clicked on a private message.
Enable Rich-Text WYSIWYG BBEditor for private messages?

The integrated BBEditor provides users with a professional method of posting a valid private message on your marketplace. When enabled, the BBEditor will appear letting the user create vibrant messages.
Can members send attachments within private messages?
If you would like to give users the ability to send and receive file attachments within private message boards then you should enable this setting.

BBCode is an integrated feature that allows users to post messages using BBCode. BBCode is a safe method of allowing users to use HTML markup syntax in a safe formatted way. For example: <b>..</b> can be used like [b]..[/b] to let the user present the text in bold.
Would you like to display the trends block on the home page?
If you would like to display the trends block showing useful information about the markeplace to all users please enable this option.
Would you like to display the icons legend block on the home page?
If you would like to display the icons legend chart on the home page to help users understand what certain icons mean or represent please enable this option.
Would you like to display the icons legend block on the search results page?
If you would like to display the icons legend chart on the search results page to help users understand what certain icons mean or represent please enable this option.
Would you like to enable most popular keyword tags by all users block on the home page?
If you would like to show users popular keyword tags used by other users on the home page please enable this option.
Would you like to enable recently used keyword tags on the home page?
If you would like to show users their recently used keywords on the home page please enable this option.
How many characters to cut off from recently used keyword tags?
Depending on your home page design you may want to increase or decrease the amount of characters each keyword tag a user enters will be visible. The default character cut off length is 35 characters.
Would you like to only display the lowest combined price within listing blocks?

If you would like to only display the lowest possible cost to the buyer within the listing blocks enable this option. For example: Buy now is 50.00 vs Current bid 25.00. If enabled, the price that would be shown is 25.00.
Would you like to display the time left whenever applicable on listing blocks?
If you would like to display the time left for listings within the listing blocks please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by price range block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by price range on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by currency block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by currency on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by seller block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by seller on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by item location block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by item location on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search options block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search options on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by colors block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by colors on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by bid range block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by bid range on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by distance radius block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by distance radius on the search results page please enable this option.
Would you like to display the search by local city / state block on the search results?
If you would like to display the search by local city / state on the search results page please enable this option.
Should service categories be listed as the first block?
If you would like to display service categories at the top please choose yes.

The integrated BBEditor provides users with a professional method of posting a valid message on your marketplace. When enabled, the BBEditor will appear during places like posting a new listing and when users place bid proposals. The BBEditor is fully BBCode-compliant.
Can an member update the title of their listed auction after it has been posted?

Globally you can set the overall outcome if users can change the listing once they have posted it live. You should disable this option if you do not want users to change the title of their listing after it is posted.
Maximum number of characters of title in auction
Enter 0 for unlimited characters or any other number to cut off the title
Would you like to be reminded when you are viewing the site as Admin in the front end?

This setting might be a good idea when enabled to remind you that you are viewing the front end (client cp) as an administrative user. The reminder will let you know that some elements on the front end will be visible to you as an admin user such as sealed bidders being non-sealed when being viewed as an admin vs. regular level access.
Would you like to enable template whitespace stripping? (compresses HTML output)

This setting will remove all whitespace from the outputted HTML template after the template parser has compiled the template ready for viewing. For example, uncompressed search results average 150kb and when whitespace stripping is enabled may reduce this to 100kb or less.
How many milliseconds should an auction countdown timer be delayed?

This setting will allow you to increase or decrease the milliseconds taken to refresh the live details on an auction page. The higher the number the slower the countdown (for older, slower servers). Default rate is 1000 (every second).
How many milliseconds should the master category selector timer be delayed?

This setting will allow you to increase or decrease the milliseconds taken to refresh the live category widget boxes in the marketplace. The higher the number the slower the category widgets will take to display (for older, slower servers). Default rate is 1200 (every second).
How many milliseconds should the additional category selector timers be delayed?

This setting will allow you to increase or decrease the milliseconds taken to refresh additional category widget boxes in the marketplace when previous category selections have already been made. The higher the number the slower the additional category widgets will take to display (for older, slower servers). Default rate is 800 (< 1 second).
How many characters to cut off from auction description?

Maximum number of characters of auction description to display in tabs like: Featured, New, Viewed or Ending Soon where is not enough space to print whole auction description. Enter 0 for unlimited characters or any other number to cut off the description
How many characters without a space before being wrapped to the next line?

Some users may test your platform by entering listing titles like aaaaaaa... and do not enter a space character. Because of this your design layout on various pages like the home page, search results, category maps may look unprofessional and could become affected. This feature prevents that by breaking up the line. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Would you like to show the promotions block on the home page?
This setting would allow you to show or hide the promotion block and hero graphics on the home page.
Would you like to enable AJAX on the auction listing page?

This setting would allow you to turn AJAX live page updates on or off. By enabling this option may increase the server load which can still be adjusted using the How many milliseconds should an auction countdown timer be delayed option.
Would you like to enable the region selector popup modals?

This setting would allow you to turn the region/location popup modal window on or off on popular sections of the marketplace such as search results and the detailed auction listing pages. By enabling this option lets the application learn more about a users location such as Country and/or Zip code which helps to calculate the best price on shipping to the closest experts and jobs by proximity and location.
Global date and time format display

This option allows you to set the global date and time display format in the marketplace. The default format is 'D, M d, Y h:i A' which would represent 'Wed, Jun 06, 2012 11:00 AM'. This format will be displayed using PHP 'DateTime' class.

This setting is used in special places that do not require the full date and time to be shown. For example, when viewing a private message that was posted 5 minutes ago would be displayed as Posted: 5 minutes ago vs. the full date and time.

Proxy blocking is especially useful because when you ban or suspend users they can easily re-register or connect to your marketplace from a different IP. In most cases, these types of users will attempt to hide behind a proxy service which acts as the connection for the user. To disable proxy services entirely, enable this option.
This setting can be used to generate a unique prefix to a users account when they register as a new user. This is a symbol that is attached to the left of the account number.

By default, SEF URLs are disabled and requires the server to have mod_rewrite enabled. When enabled, SEF urls provide major search engines the ability to easily index urls in the marketplace increasing exposure to your web site.
Should characters in a SEF url be all lowercase?

By default, SEF urls if enabled will treat the URL characters with uppercase as well as lowercase characters. This options allows you to force all characters in a SEF URL lowercase. Once established in a production environment, it would not be recommended to change this option as it may affect search engine rankings when a url change is detected.
Do you wish to allow UTF-8 characters within SEF urls?

Some older web browsers cannot handle utf-8 encoded urls but most all modern browsers do. If you would like to disable special characters within the urls on your marketplace please disable this feature.
Maximum days before a transaction becomes outstanding (due)
This setting gives you the chance to provide users with a grace period to sum up for unpaid invoice transaction for actions and events that may be invoked during their session.
Minimum deposit amount to online account balance
This setting controls the minimum amount of money a user can deposit to their online account balance from the deposit menu.
Maximum deposit amount to online account balance
This setting controls the maximum amount of money a user can deposit to their online account balance from the deposit menu.
Minimum withdraw amount from online account balance
This setting controls the minimum amount of money a user can withdraw from their online account balance from the withdraw menu.
Maximum withdraw amount from online account balance
This setting controls the maximum amount of money a user can withdraw from their online account balance from the withdraw menu.
Number of thumbnails to display per row within portfolios?
This feature allows you to set how many thumbnails will be presented on the portfolio page when users are viewing the portfolio section. The default setting is 3.
Official marketplace style id presentation to serve
This option is especially helpful if you would like to force a default style to be displayed when users connect to the marketplace.
Enable date of birth requirement during registration?
This setting allows you to force users to enter their date of birth during the registration form.
Would you like to enable Flash countdown timer applet?

By default the flash time left feature is disabled. When enabled, users will see a live countdown applet showing realtime time left status for that listing. Additionally, when enabled, the server will require more processing power which may result in slower access times and overall experience.
Would you like users to verify their email during registration?

When this setting is enabled, the newly registered user will need to view their email inbox for a link within that email. The user would need to click that link in order to verify their email address. This setting when enabled ensures a live person is registering.
This blacklist will hold all your banned/blacklist email addresses you do not want users to be able to use. For each email to blacklist, separate by 1 space. Example: hotmail.com yahoo.com aol.com
This blacklist will hold all your banned/blacklist usernames you do not want users to be able to use. For each name to blacklist, separate by 1 space. Example: root r00t admin adm1n.

This setting determines if escrow will be used on your site or not. When escrow is disabled, outside payment between users will be active letting users conduct their own transactions. Regardless of escrow being enabled or disabled, the marketplace will still generate commission fees (other than escrow) to be paid in full accordingly (if applicable). Additionally, when enabled the user posting the auction listing will ultimately decide if they will use escrow for their auction. This option (when enabled) is available to them. When enabled escrow funding is between the site owner and the person funding an escrow account for a listing in the marketplace.

This option should be used if your members prefer to see distance calculation responses within a metric other than miles. For example, Canada uses KM so it would be miles * 1.60943 = 1 KM. The default response is calculated within miles (enter 0 for miles).
This option will show the viewer the metric you have chosen to use. It is a symbol (KM, Miles, etc) which will present itself when showing a calculation response. For example: 83 miles or 83 KM.
Allow members under the age of 18 to register?

This setting is an enhancement of the date of birth global option and must be enabled in order to use this feature properly. This setting will present a message to the user attempting to register denying access only if the user enters an age lower than 18.
Would you like to enable anti-bid sniping?

When enabled, this setting will prevent bid-snipers from being able to submit a bid at the last ending minutes (or seconds) of an product auction event. As a result, the auction will extend itself automatically based on the settings you define for anti-bid sniping extending. When enabled, you can still enable or disable anti bid sniping on a per-category basis using the product auction category manager.
Would you like to enable bidder name in bid history?
When enabled, this setting will display the bidder name in the bid history tab else the bidder name will be simply display as **********.
Enter the duration to extend the auction (value in seconds)
This setting applies only when the anti-bid sniping feature is enabled. This feature allows you to define how many seconds to extend the auction event when a bid-sniper has been detected.
Would you like to enable proxy bidding?

This is a global setting. When enabled, you can still enable or disable proxy bidding on a per-category basis using the product auction category manager. Proxy bidding allows product buyers to enter their maximum bid and the marketplace will assign a virtual bidder to compete for him until his maximum bid has reached the limit willing to pay.
Enable final value fees to sellers for auctions that have a winning bidder?

This is a global setting. When enabled all pre-defined final value fee groups and values within groups will be activated. Additionally, if you set this setting to No, this will quickly disable the entire Final Value Fee system until you enable this again.
Would you like to charge safe escrow commission fees?

This setting is a global option. When enabled you can define the escrow fee commission logic based on settings below. When disabled, no fees will be charged to any user for the use of safe escrow and will act like a free value added service.
For registered businesses, LLC, Incorporated companies, this setting should be filled in. At this time, the only place this registration number is displayed is on the print invoice template.
If you have a registered VAT business number please supply it within this field. This will only be displayed on the print invoice template.
Allow users to enter VAT registration number in their profile?
If you would like to show a form field on the profile menu for users to enter their VAT registration number turn this feature on.
Allow users to enter D-U-N-S business number in their profile?

A D-U-N-S Number is a unique nine-digit sequence recognized as the universal standard for identifying and keeping track of over 140 million businesses worldwide. To allow users to enter this number turn this feature on.
Enter your ILance affiliate code to earn 10% with ILance
If you have not purchased branding removal sign-up to ILance's Affiliate Program to obtain an affiliate code and earn 10% for each visitor who clicks your link and purchases a valid ILance product.
Enter the URL to your Facebook company or fan page
If you have a Facebook company or fan page setup please enter the URL to this page so users can visit your page from the footer links of the marketplace.
Enter the URL to your Twitter company or fan page
If you have a Twitter fan page setup please enter the URL to this page so users can visit your page from the footer links of the marketplace.
Enter the URL to your GooglePlus company or fan page
If you have a GooglePlus fan page setup please enter the URL to this page so users can visit your page from the footer links of the marketplace.
Enter the URL for your home page ad
Please enter a valid url to where users will be redirected when they click on the advertisement banner on the home page of the marketplace.
Would you like to moderate and verify all new users?

This feature allows you to moderate and verify all new user registrations before the user is able to gain access to the marketplace via login menu. When enabled, an email will be dispatched to the admin informing of a new user to verify.
Enable email dispatch of unpaid invoice reminders to users?
This setting ensures that unpaid invoice reminders will be dispatched to users via email when payment is due and the transaction is still unpaid.
Email dispatch frequency for unpaid invoice transactions (in days)

This setting compliments sending email reminders to users with unpaid invoice transactions. From this setting you can define the resend frequency (in days) that emails will resend if users have not paid for transactions that are overdue. Default is 15 days.
How many days after the unpaid invoice reminder is sent should the first reminder be sent?

For example, if a user has not paid for a transaction and the first reminder email was sent, how many days after the first email reminder should we continue to dispatch unpaid email invoice notices? (default is 3 days).
Would you like to enable popup preview within portfolios?

This setting allows you to let users mouse-over an image within the portfolio system to be shown a popup larger view of the image. Note: the popup system will only display file-types that you define for your portfolio display image extension types.
Would you like to charge service buyers a fixed commission fee? (enter 0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge service buyers for securing their funds for a project they have posted and awarded to a service provider. This setting is also based on a fixed-price amount only (format like 5.00). Note: this setting will take presidence over the percentage logic and cannot be mixed and matched.
Would you like to charge service buyers a percentage commission fee? (enter 0.0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge service buyers for securing their funds for a project they have posted and awarded to a service provider. This setting is also based on a percentage value only and is calculated as (awarded bid amount * percentage you enter here / 100) (expected format is 2.5 not 2.5%). Note: this setting will take presidence over the fixed amount logic only if the fixed amount is set to 0 (disabled).
Would you like to charge service providers a fixed commission fee? (enter 0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge service providers for receiving their funds for a project they have bid on and become awarded. This setting is also based on a fixed-price amount only (format like 5.00). Note: this setting will take presidence over the percentage logic and cannot be mixed and matched.
Would you like to charge service providers a percentage commission fee? (enter 0.0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge service providers for receiving their funds for a project they have bid on and become awarded. This setting is also based on a percentage value only and is calculated like (awarded bid amount * percentage you enter here / 100) (format like 2.5 not 2.5%). Note: this setting will take presidence over the fixed amount logic only if the fixed amount is set to 0 (disabled).
Slideshow item photo extensions enabled for uploading [separated by comma and 1 space]
Maximum digital file attachment [FILESIZE in bytes]
Would you like to enable insertion fees to sellers that post new product listings?

This is a global setting. When enabled all pre-defined insertion fee groups and values within groups will be activated. Additionally, if you set this setting to No, this will quickly disable the entire Insertion Fee system until you enable this again.
How much are sellers charged to upload each additional Slideshow Picture to their listing?

When sellers list their item they can upload 1 free picture which is showcased in the search results. If you would like to charge sellers for uploading more pictures (considered a slideshow) then enter the amount per each uploaded picture. If you do not want to charge sellers for uploading slideshow pictures set this value to 0.
How much are sellers charged to set a reserve price amount on their listing?

If you would like to charge sellers for setting a reserve price enter the amount to charge. If you do not want to charge sellers a fee for setting a reserve price amount on their listing set this value to 0.
How much are sellers charged to set a buy now fixed price amount on their listing?

If you would like to charge sellers for setting a buy now fixed price enter the amount to charge. If you do not want to charge sellers a fee for setting a buy now fixed price amount set this value to 0.
How much are sellers charged to post a classified ad listing?
If you would like to charge sellers for posting classified ads enter the amount to charge. If you do not want to charge sellers a fee for posting a classified ad set this value to 0.
How much are sellers charged to use Video Description URLs on their listing?

If you would like to charge sellers for the use of videos within their listings (considered an enhancement) then enter the amount to charge. If you do not want to charge sellers a fee for video descriptions set this value to 0.
Item photo extensions enabled for upload [separated by comma and 1 space]
Maximum item photo attachment [WIDTH in px]
Maximum item photo on listing page [WIDTH in px]
Maximum item photo on listing page [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum item photo thumbnail on listing page [WIDTH in px]
Maximum item photo thumbnail on listing page [HEIGHT in px]
Force sellers to include picture when selling an item?
Maximum item photo attachment [HEIGHT in px]
Maximum item photo attachment [FILESIZE in bytes]
Digital file extensions enabled for uploading [separated by comma and 1 space]
Would you like to charge sellers a fixed commission fee? (enter 0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge sellers for encouraging bidders to pay sellers via safe escrow they have bid on and won. This setting is also based on a fixed-price amount only (format like 5.00). Note: this setting will take presidence over the percentage logic and cannot be mixed and matched.
Would you like to charge sellers a percentage commission fee? (enter 0.0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge product sellers for receiving their funds for an auction they have sold via auction or buy now format. This setting is also based on a percentage value only and is calculated like (awarded bid amount * percentage you enter here / 100) (format like 2.5 not 2.5%). Note: this setting will take presidence over the fixed amount logic only if the fixed amount is set to 0 (disabled).
Would you like to charge product buyers a fixed commission fee? (enter 0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge product buyers for securing their funds for an auction item or buy now order they have won or purchased directly from a seller. This setting is also based on a fixed-price amount only (format like 5.00). Note: this setting will take presidence over the percentage logic and cannot be mixed and matched.
Would you like to charge product buyers a percentage commission fee? (enter 0.0 to disable)

This setting will only work when safe escrow commission fees are enabled. This specific setting will let you charge product buyers for securing their funds for an auction item or buy now order they have won or purchased directly from a seller. This setting is also based on a percentage value only and is calculated like (item amount * percentage you enter here / 100) (format like 2.5 not 2.5%). Note: this setting will take presidence over the fixed amount logic only if the fixed amount is set to 0 (disabled).
Would you like to enable the bold service listing title option?
When enabled this setting will let a user see the bold listing title option to enhance their listing when creating a new auction listing.
Can users pay to bold the title of their service listing?
When enabled this setting will let a user have the ability to pay to enhance their listing through the use of bold listing feature.
How much does it cost to use the bold service listing feature?
This setting works only when you have enabled the ability for users to pay to bold their listing. For example, enter 5.00 if you would like to charge five dollars.
Can users feature their service auction listing on the front home page?
If you would like to give users the ability to feature their auction listing on the home page when creating a new listing please enable this setting.
Would you like to charge a fee to feature service auction listings on the home page?
If you would like to give users the ability to pay you for featuring their listing when creating a new auction please enable this setting.
Home page Featured service listing fee amount
This setting works only when you are charging members for featuring their listing on the home page of the marketplace. The amount you enter in this field can only be a fixed dollar amount.
Can users feature their service auction listing in search results?
If you would like to give users the ability to feature their service auction listing in search results when creating a new listing please enable this setting.
Would you like to charge a fee to feature service auction listings in search results?
If you would like to give users the ability to pay you for featuring their listing when creating a new service auction please enable this setting.
Search results featured service listing fee amount
This setting works only when you are charging members for featuring their service listing in search results of the marketplace. The amount you enter in this field can only be a fixed dollar amount.
Can users feature their product auction listing in search results?
If you would like to give users the ability to feature their product auction listing in search results when creating a new listing please enable this setting.
Would you like to charge a fee to feature product auction listings in search results?
If you would like to give users the ability to pay you for featuring their listing when creating a new product auction please enable this setting.
Search results featured product listing fee amount
This setting works only when you are charging members for featuring their product listing in search results of the marketplace. The amount you enter in this field can only be a fixed dollar amount.
How much are buyers charged to use Video Description URLs on their listing?

If you would like to charge buyers for the use of videos within their listings (considered an enhancement) then enter the amount to charge. If you do not want to charge buyers a fee for video descriptions set this value to 0.
How long can a featured portfolio item last? (value in days)
This setting allows you to define (in days) how long a featured portfolio item will stay featured for. Default is 14 days.
How many days is a home page featured listing valid for?

If you enable home page featured listings you can specify the duration in days listings will remain featured on home page of the marketplace. You can also set 0 which will feature listings throughout the duration of the auction.
How many days is a home page featured listing valid for?

If you enable home page featured listings you can specify the duration in days a listing will remain featured on home page of the marketplace. You can also set 0 which will feature listings throughout the duration of the auction.
Is the commission fee being generated from a provider to buyer invoice a fixed fee?

This setting only applies if you have enabled provider to buyer invoice generation fees. If you would like to charge a fixed fee instead of a percentage (based on the invoice amount) please set this option to true.
Enter the value used to calculate provider to buyer commission fees

If you have enabled provider to buyer invoice generation fee commission please enter the amount to calculate in this field. If you are charging a fee based on a percentage value please format the value as 0.0. If you are charging a fixed fee format it like 10.00 (as per example).
How many seconds before the auction finishes can anti-bid snipe execute?

This setting applies only when the anti-bid sniping feature is enabled. This feature allows you to define the amount in seconds when the auction event is about to finish to allow anti-bid sniping to execute. For example, if you enter 60, this would mean that anti-bid sniping would execute if a bid-sniper is placing a bid 60 seconds or less before the event finishes.
How many times will the countdown be reset during anti-bid sniping?

This setting applies only when the anti-bid sniping feature is enabled. This feature allows you to define the amount of times the countdown timer on the listing page will be reset from anti-bid sniping. For example, if you enter 5, the countdown timer would reset 5 times then stop resetting letting the countdown expire regardless of new bids being placed.
Would you like to enable the portfolio system?

This setting allows you to launch a portfolio area within the marketplace allowing users to upload their designs, media and more for review by guests, visitors and potential clients. When enabled a Portolio link in the top header of the marketplace will be visible.
When a cookie is created this prefix will identify the core variables used to read and write from the users web browser.
Verified profile answers duration length [enter value in days] the verified icon will be displayed
Can members update their verified profile answers after successful verification payment?
Enable profile verification moderation? [admin verify manually via verification manager]?
Maximum number of results to fetch and display from the database for customer listings within AdminCP?
This option communicates with your database and will let you define how many results to pull based on specific areas within the AdminCP.
Would you like to enable the Refresh splash screen when an action has been performed on the marketplace?

This option will produce a message to the user asking them to please wait while your request has been completed. When disabled the refresh logic will immediately redirect the user without any message shown.
Can members compose private messages to other members?

This feature is a global setting. If you are positive that you do not want users to compose private messages to one another in the marketplace you should disable this setting. Additionally, if enabled you can set membership permissions on various plans which also determines if a user within a specific membership plan can compose a private message.
Show realtime deposit gateway fee calculation breakdown in deposit menu?

This setting allows you to let the user see (in realtime) the fees associated with the amount they are entering into the deposit funds form from the deposit menu. This feature uses Javascript technology and updates itself on each character typed into the deposit field.
Would you like to enable Offsite Deposit Payment?
When this setting is enabled, users can use one of defined Offsite Deposit Types to deposit money.
Would you like to enable Offsite Payment Types?
When this setting is enabled, users can use one of defined Offsite Payment Types as auction payment method.
Enable advanced search engine flood protection (can query advanced search every x seconds)?

The majority of server processing and loading will be from guests, members and search bots looking for specific content using the advanced search system. Resources are queried from the database (cat, counters, prices, bids, averages, etc) and can sometimes take a bit to process (depending on the query). By enabling flood protection provides an even balance on the server on a per-session basis.
If search engine flood protection is on how many seconds must each user wait between each advanced search request?

This option will allow you to specify how many seconds a member or guest must wait before requesting a new search from the advance search menu. This option is especially useful to reduce the server load.
Would you like to enable Fulltext search?

Boolean fulltext mode queries became available in MySQL in version 4, and allow expressions to make use of a complex set of boolean rules to let users refine their searches. These queries are very powerful when applied to fulltext searching and sorting of results when enabled.
Would you like to enable search spelling auto-correction?

When enabled this feature gives your users the ability to accurately find the items or jobs that matter most to them by supplying them with additional keyword searches based on correct spelling of their intended keywords. For example, Computr would come back as Computer for the user to click and search instead.
Would you like to enable saved searches?

This feature allows logged in members the ability to save their search when searching for products or services. Additionally, users can subscribe via email so when new matches are met they receive a new email with results.
Would you like to enable public message boards filter?
This feature allows users to filter search results with active public message boards within the listing.
Would you like to enable search by images filter?
This feature allows users to filter search results that only contain images.
Would you like to enable search by no active images filter?
This feature allows users to filter search results that do not contain an item photo.
Would you like to enable product with free shipping filter?
This feature allows the members to filter search results only with free shipping.
Would you like to enable product as lots filter?
This feature allows the members to filter search results only as lots.
Would you like to enable product as escrow payment filter?
This feature allows the members to filter search results only the product payment set as escrow.
Would you like to enable product as donation filter?
This feature allows the members to filter search results only the product set as donation item.
Would you like to enable product completed listing filter?
This feature allows the members to filter product search results as completed listing.
Would you like to enable work as public board filter?
This feature allows the members to filter work set only as public board.
Would you like to enable work as escrow filter?
This feature allows the members to filter work set payment as escrow.
Would you like to enable non-disclosed budget filter?
This feature allows users to search listings that have a non-disclosed budget.
Would you like to enable work as completed filter?
This feature allows the members to filter work as completed.
Would you like to display header title columns for Job search results?
This display uses the older search display view when searching jobs in the marketplace. Disabling this will show the new style display view.
Would you like to display header title columns for Item search results?
This display uses the older search display view when searching items in the marketplace. Disabling this will show the new style display view.
Would you like to display header title columns for Contractor search result?
This display uses the older search display view when searching contractors in the marketplace. Disabling this will show the new style display view.
Would you like to display a "one left" ribbon on top of item images within the search results?
When enabled this will display a vibrant "ribbon" like display over top of item images improving the chances of an item purchase with the words "one left"
How many categories to display on the main page until a more option link becomes visble

This feature can really help the look and feel of your category on the main page. If you have many categories, you can define how many of them will show before the rest become hidden and a More link becomes visible allowing the user to see the rest.
Show a link to let buyers contact the seller via private message from the listing page?

When you enable this option lets buyers contact the seller from the listing page through private message. Both users will be able to respond to each other back and forth and receiving email notificaitons of new private messages received.
This will contain specific code data used by the advanced search options menu. Do not manually edit.
This option is used as a datastore for the presentation of the search results columns displayed in the marketplace. Please do not edit this string.
The framework version would only be updated if an upgrade procedure is performed. This value is updated automatically and should never be changed from this area.
The sql framework version would only be updated if an upgrade procedure is performed. This value is updated automatically and should never be changed from this area.
Can a product buyer retract their bid before the listing ends?
This setting allows you to define if a product buyer is able to retract their bid from a listing before the event ends. When disabled, buyers cannot retract their bids before the listing ends.
Can a product buyer retract their winning bid?
This setting allows you to define if a product buyer is able to retract their winning bid after a product auction event has completed. When disabled, buyers cannot retract their winning bids.
Minimum rating (out of 5) to show at least 1 star
Maximum rating (out of 5) to show at least 1 star
Minimum rating (out of 5) to show at least 2 stars
Maximum rating (out of 5) to show at least 2 stars
Minimum rating (out of 5) to show at least 3 stars
Maximum rating (out of 5) to show at least 3 stars
Minimum rating (out of 5) to show at least 4 stars
Maximum rating (out of 5) to show at least 4 stars
Minimum rating (out of 5) to show at least 5 stars
Maximum rating (out of 5) to show at least 5 stars
Can service providers retract their bid proposal before they are awarded by the buyer?

This setting defines the ability to let pre-awarded service providers (placebid status only) retract (remove) their bid proposal. If you do not want service providers to retract their bids before a buyer awards them set this feature to disabled.
