Can service providers retract their bid proposal after they have been awarded by the buyer?

This setting defines the ability to let awarded service providers to retract (remove) their bid proposal. If you do not want service providers to retract their awarded bids set this feature to disabled.
If a buyer awarded a service provider how long should the marketplace wait for the provider to accept the buyers award (in days)?

This setting ensures that a buyers project does not get a deadbeat provider delaying the project. This setting automatically resets the buyers project to open if there is any time left and respectively declines the providers awarded bid so others can become awarded.
Can buyers unaward a providers bid proposal after it was awarded?

This setting defines the ability to let buyers unaward already awarded service providers. If you do not want service buyers to unaward an already awarded bid they have already comitted to set this feature to disabled.
Would you like to enable Pay as you Go?
When enabled, any insertion fees incured during the posting of an auction will need to be paid prior to public visibility. All unpaid auctions will be visible from the users pending auction area.
Would you like to enable the listing fees table during the posting of a listing?
When enabled, this feature will display the insertion fee table for service or product and/or budget based insertion fee table when a member is posting a new listing so fees are visibly shown.
How many hours until a listing is considered Ending Soon?
You can specify when an ending soon auction should be considered ending soon.]
Would you like to display custom questions underneath categories when viewing the category map?

You can choose to enable the viewing of custom auction specifics underneath certain categories that contain item specifics on the category map listings. If you would like to see them enable this setting.
Enter the amount (in days) category maps will display a new listings posted icon beside the title

When enabled users will see a new listing icon beside the category title representing new listings posted since the last x days. For example if you enter 3 a new listing icon will show for listings in categories posted up to 3 days ago as still newly listed. To disable this feature please enter 0.
Enter the category titles depth level shown on category maps

For marketplaces with lots of categories you can limit subcategories to a certain depth to prevent all categories being shown at once. For example, if you enter 2 then Level 1 > Level 2 will be shown even if you had 10 levels that category structure.
How many custom category questions to display until a more options link becomes activated?

This setting is useful when one or more categories have 5 or more custom category specifics in them. Instead of crowding the page with many category questions/specifics this feature will present the user with a More options link based on the value you enter.
How many custom category answers to display until a more options link becomes activated?

This setting is useful when one or more custom category questions have 5 or more custom category answers in them. Instead of crowding the page this feature will present the user with a more options link based on the value you enter.
How many levels deep will the category questions be visible in the category maps?
This feature allows you to determine how many subcategory levels deep you wish to pull custom category specifics from when users are viewing the category map pages.
Would you like the selected category to show in the left nav?

This option controls the ability to show the currently selected category in bold from the left nav showing any subcategories below. Disabling this feature will not show the user the currently selected category at all and will only show subcategories.
How many categories to display until a more option link becomes visble

This feature can really help the look and feel of your category map pages. If you have many categories, you can define how many of them will show (from top to bottom) before the rest become hidden and a More link becomes visible allowing the user to see the rest.
Would you like to show a (Back To: [cat]) link in the left nav menu search results?

This feature simply gives the seacher more control over viewing the category structure from the search results. This will show a clickable link allowing the user to move back a category if viewing more than level 1 parent categories.
Maximum width to display when viewing portfolio image in popup mode?
This setting lets you define the maximum width of a portfolio image when viewing in popup window.
Maximum height to display when viewing portfolio image in popup mode?
This setting lets you define the maximum height of a portfolio image when viewing in popup window.
Default city name to display on registration form?
When users are viewing the registration form for the first time, which major City would you like displayed by default?
Would you like to enable tax on escrow commission fees?

This setting will only work when commission fee invoice types are enabled from your tax zone manager within payment modules area. When enabled all fees generated will include applicable taxes as well (as long as the user being taxed is within the region defined within the tax zone manager).
Delete log entries after x days (0 to disable)
This option is especially useful to keep your database pruned and organized by removing older logs after so many days in which you define. By default, this option is disabled.
Show featured listings on the home page?
When enabled, a result set of featured-status service and/or product listings will be presented on the home page.
Show ending soon listings on the home page?
When enabled, a result set of ending soon status service and/or product listings will be presented on the home page.
Would you like to show latest listings posted on the home page?
When enabled, a live scroller result set of latest listings posted will be presented on the home page.
Would you like to enable category template caching?

This feature will create html templates based on your category system within the ./cache/ speeding up the category maps and pulldown menus when displayed. This feature will drastically help improve the speed of your marketplace if you have a lot of categories and many users browsing your site per day.
Enter time to live (in minutes) for category template caching regeneration

This option will tell the caching engine to rebuild and regenerate the cached category map templates within the server cache folder every x minutes. This is useful if you have many categories and more than 1,000 unique visitors per day and will reduce the load on the database extremely well. A regenerated category template will also refresh the category counters if they are enabled within category maps.
Enter the overload limit on this server before a notice is presented to users informing them to retry the site later (0 to disable)

You can choose to provide your users will a helpful message informing them to retry the site later based on a server overload feature available on web servers running any flavour of Linux. This feature does not work on Windows. To enable, enter your max-load server limit.
Would you like to show all subcategories within the pulldown menus?

This feature should be enabled if your category system is small (ie: less than 50 categories). If you have over 50 categories and you enable this feature, it will provide your users with a very fast pulldown menu showing only base root categories.
Would you like to enable the Skills system?
This option will allow users to make use of the skills system. They can opt into various skill categories and can be searched based on skills from the advanced search menu.
Would you like to display the popular tags search system?
The popular search tags feature produces realtime keyword search tags queried within the marketplace by users.
Would you like to reset popular tags every month?
To prevent abuse and keyword stuffing by users you can reset popular tags on a monthly basis.
How many searches does it take before a tag becomes popular?
This setting lets you define how many times a keyword tag needs to be searched by users in the system before it becomes popular and displayed within the popular search tag area.
How many popular keyword to display at once?
This setting lets you define how many actual popular keyword tags will be displayed at any given time when users are viewing the popular keyword tags.
Would you like to enable News from ILance on the Dashboard?
This setting will only pull latest news from ILance and when news is available a tab will be displayed on your main admin control panel dashboard letting you view the latest news from Team ILance.

Your default meta page title tag should contain a global slogan or statement regarding the overall purpose of the marketplace offering or business. This meta page title will appear on the main marketplace landing page and other areas that do not have a defined site title for that area or section.

Your default meta description tag should contain information about your marketplace offering or business. This description will appear to search engines everywhere except for pages or sections where a custom meta description would apply (viewing a listing, search results, category maps, etc).

Your default meta keywords tag should contain specific keywords that directly relate to your business or offerings. These keywords will appear to search engines everywhere except for pages or sections where a custom keyword would apply (searching the marketplace, category maps, etc).
Would you like to enable the Nonprofit Charity system?

This option will allow sellers to choose a donation percentage and a nonprofit orgainzation. When enabled, the seller can choose if they will donate or not during the posting of their listing. This feature is optional and is not forced upon your sellers.
Would you like to enable Bulk Uploading?

When enabled, sellers can choose to post their new items for sale via Bulk Upload. This requires the seller to upload a .csv (comma separated value) file with pre-filled in values. For example, in one upload session a seller could potentially upload 1000 listings in a matter of seconds.
Maximum number of listings per Bulk Upload session?

This setting works only when Bulk Uploading is enabled. This setting will define how many listings can be uploaded by any given user at any given time on a per bulk-import basis (meaning they can upload another xxx listings in a new bulk upload session).
Maximum number of listings in Bulk Upload Preview?
This setting works only when Bulk Uploading is enabled. This setting will define how many listings can be displayed on Bulk Upload Preview.
Search Engine Friendly Service Category Listing Schema
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly service category listing url schema.
Search Engine Friendly Product Category Listing Schema
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly product category listing url schema.
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for service categories. Default is Projects. Example output: domain.com/projects
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for product categories. Default is Items. Example output: domain.com/items

This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for service category maps. Default is Categories/Projects. Example output: domain.com/categories/projects

This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for product category maps. Default is Categories/Items. Example output: domain.com/categories/items

This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for the main category index map. Default is Categories. Example output: domain.com/categories

This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for the main listings index map. Default is Listings. Example output: domain.com/listings
Search Engine Friendly Service Auction Listing Schema
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly service auction listing url schema.
Search Engine Friendly Product Auction Listing Schema
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly product auction listing url schema.
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for service auction listings. Default is Project. Example output: domain.com/project
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for product auction listings. Default is Item. Example output: domain.com/item
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for expert category listings. Default is Experts. Example output: domain.com/experts

This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for viewing members including feedback history and profile detail specifics. Default is Members. Example output: domain.com/members
This setting works only when SEO is enabled. This setting will define your search engine friendly url identifier for viewing portfolios. Default is Portfolios. Example output: domain.com/portfolios
Would you like to display a pop-out menu when a users mouse hovers over Categories link from the top nav menu?
This setting can ultimately lead to bandwidth saving where root categories can be quickly seen and clicked on without additional page loading from anywhere within the marketplace
If the category pop-out menu is active enter the category type to show (service or product)

Since the category pop-out menu cannot show both category systems in a single pop-out please enter either service or product in the field to show one category type or another when the users mouse hovers over the category link within the top nav header menu. Default value is product.
Would you like to display category listing counters on the main marketplace menu in the left nav?
You can enable or disable main menu category listing counters within the left nav menu. Default is disabled.
Maximum number of ship services allowed for item listings?
Default is 5 shipping services. Maximum shipping services is 10.
Would you like to enable the Shipping API?

When enabled sellers can choose to auto calculate shipping rates from their location to buyers of the marketplace. This feature would present a new option during the post an item shipping pull down menu. You will need to define your shipping API user and password details in your config.php file. Supported carriers include FedEx, UPS and USPS.
Would you like to turn on debug mode for the Shipping API?

When enabled the output will show debugging information useful in some cases to understand issues or problems of some API settings not working for your web site using one or more of the shipping services API. Supported carriers with debug information output include FedEx, UPS and USPS.
Would you like to enable digital downloads within the shipping pull down menu?

When enabled, a phrase will appear called "Digital Download Delivery" in the shipping pull down menu and will allow sellers to upload digital items such as programs, web sites, graphics, etc. You can configure what file extensions you will support for digital download (when sellers are uploading to the marketplace) within your attachment settings and limits within the Admin CP.
Would you like to enable the auction format tab when sellers post an item?

When enabled, sellers can click on the auction tab from their selling format section allowing buyers to place bids on their listings. When disabled, the auction format tab will not be visible when selling an item.
Would you like to enable the fixed priced tab when sellers post an item?

When enabled, sellers can click on the fixed price tab from their selling format section allowing buyers to purchase their items directly from the item listing page. When disabled, the fixed price tab will not be visible when selling an item.
Would you like to enable the classified tab when sellers post an item?

When enabled, sellers can click on the classified tab from their selling format section allowing buyers to only see the sellers advertised price, phone number and a button to let the buyer contact the seller directly. When disabled, classifieds tab will not be visible.
Would you like to enable public facing marketplace?
When disabled, visitors will be required to register and/or sign-in before being able to access the marketplace resources.
How many currencies to display until More link becomes activated in search results?

This setting is useful when you have lot of listings in different currencies within the search results. To avoid showing all currencies at once you can enter a value to only show up to 3 currencies for example before a more link is visible to display more.
You can localize your marketplace using this option. Instead of using default country, state you can define your own format. You can use this variables [city] [zip] [state] [country]
Option to optimize your bandwidth connection. Using this feature site is compressed and sends less data.
Would you like to execute automation tasks in the web page footer?

If you do not have an external cron job connecting to cron.php every minute you should enable this option. If you would like to execute cron jobs externally you could use the following command in a cron job every minute: wget -O /dev/null "http://www.yourdomain.com/cron.php"; 2> /dev/null and then disable this option.
Would you like to serve minified versions of Javascripts and CSS?

This option allows you to serve the smallest possible version of the Javascripts and CSS used in the application so page loads are much quicker. Disable this option to use the non-compressed Javascripts instead.
Send a friendly reminder informing the user about the membership renewal.
What is the default membership role ID to use when all membership plans are hidden?

This feature is required if you've setup all your membership plans and those plans are hidden from registration. In order to opt users into a specific membership role without their input please enter the default role ID number to fulfill the registration process.

You can whitelist a number of domain hosts who are permitted to send POST requests to the marketplace. In some situations PayPal and other payment processors may need to send a user from paypal.com back to your web site and may do it via POST. The format is expected to be domains separated by 1 space. For example: paypal.com moneybookers.com. You may also include IP addresses.
How many days after ended, the auction will be archived?
You can specify when auction will be automatically archived.
Minimum offline deposit amount to online account balance
This setting controls the minimum amount of money a user can deposit to their online account balance from the offline deposit menu.
Maximum offline deposit amount to online account balance
This setting controls the maximum amount of money a user can deposit to their online account balance from the offline deposit menu.
When enabled, listing owner can delete his auction from archived listings.
Do you want to remove expired watch list items for users automatically?

Display detailed inventory information to sellers during the posting of an item?

When enabled this feature allows sellers to keep their inventory listed on the marketplace accurate with their internal stock keeping through detailed item information (for searching, viewing, etc). Additionally, when enabled fields such as UPC code, SKU code, Part Number and Model number will be visible during the creation of item listings in the marketplace.
If you would like to show sellers the block to save their listing as draft during a new listing please select yes.
If you would like to show sellers the block to let them send email inviations to other people during a new listing please select yes.
If you would like to show sellers the block to let them select methods to block certain buyers from placing bids or buying now please select yes.
If you would like to show sellers the option to let them turn on or off a public message board on their listing please select yes.
If you would like to show sellers the block to define their return policy information for the new item please select yes.

If you would like to show sellers the option to sell an item in the future as a scheduled listing please select yes. Please note that if you select no this will disable the search results page from showing upcoming listings filter from the buying format as well as hide the tab called Upcoming on the search result top tab navigation filter.

This option allows you to set the date display format for every date displayed in the marketplace. The default formatting is M d, Y which would represent Jun 06, 2012. This format will be displayed using DateTime class.
This UPS access id code is provided to you during your registation to the UPS company web site.
This UPS username is provided to you during your registration to the UPS company web site.
This UPS password is provided to you during your registration to the UPS company web site.
This URL will be the access point to the UPS web shipping services API.
This USPS username is provided to you during your registration to the USPS company web site.
This USPS password is provided to you during your registration to the USPS company web site.
This URL will be the access point to the USPS web shipping services API.
This FedEx account number is provided to you during your registration to the FedEx company web site.
This meter number is provided to you during your registration to the FedEx company web site.
This FedEx developer key allows developers to test the FedEx Web Services API in development mode.
This FedEx password is provided to you during your registration to the FedEx company web site.
This URL will be the access point to the FedEx web shipping services API.
If you would like to show sellers the block to let them submit a video to their listing please select yes.
Would you like to enable the Send Invoice option in Selling Activity?
If you would like to give sellers the option of sending an invoice to their receipent please select yes.
Would you like to enable worldwide within the shipping pull down menu?
This option allows the admin to enable the option of 'worldwide' within the pull down menu when sellers are posting items for sale and defining their ship-to preferences.

This option allows you to narrow down the regions that will appear within the marketplace and seller ship-to features. You can select single or multiple regions from this setting to enable country support within the selected regions.
Maximum number of characters of description in auction posted from bulk?
Enter 0 for unlimited characters or any other number to cut off the description.
Would you like to enable SMTP (Simple mail transfer protocol)?
SMTP is an Internet standard for electronic mail transmission across Internet Protocol (IP) networks. This protocol is in widespread use today.
Would you like to use TLS (Transport Layer Security)?
This setting allow usage of cryptographic protocols that provide communication security over the Internet. Depending on your SMTP provider this option may be limited.
Simple mail transfer protocol host port.
Simple mail transfer protocol authentication username.
Simple mail transfer protocol authentication password.

This setting will allow your core marketplace platform to use various high availibility cache engines to reduce queries read from your database server. Depending on your server configuration your options may be limited to 'None' and 'File Cache'.
This setting is recommended and will save your cache data using a prefix. For example, a 'category' cache key would be formatted as 'ilance_category' if your cache prefix value is ilance_.
This setting will expire old cache if these many seconds have past. If your server is experiencing high loads choose a high number such as 300 to 600 seconds. Default is 90 seconds.

As of ILance 4.1 this setting gives you the option of choosing which marketplace platform will be default when users first connect to your web site domain. ILance 3.x series all service/product logic was doubled (cats/listings/sliders/menus) which on some legacy servers caused speed concern. ILance 4.1+ still offers both service and product platforms but utilized on separate domains both connected to the master database server.
This setting controls how long a search bot/crawler holds a valid session before it's considered expired. Input value in minutes.
This setting controls how long an admin holds a valid session before it's considered expired. Input value in minutes.
This setting controls how long a signed-in member holds a valid session before it's considered expired. Input value in minutes.
This setting controls how long a guest holds a valid session before it's considered expired. Input value in minutes.

When enabled this setting allows your server to reduce it's load considerably by not sending emails dispatched to users in realtime. If you would like to send email to users in realtime please disable this option.
